lead_paragraph: Michael van Gerwen has won 25 tournaments this year and about $1.5 million in prize money. But greatness in darts is measured in world championships, and he has only one.

headline.main: He’s the Michael Jordan of Darts. He Just Has to Prove It.
headline.print_headline: Michael Jordan of Darts? As Soon as He Proves It

abstract: World's No 1-ranked darts player Michael van Gerwen hopes to extend his remarkable recent winning streak at upcoming World Darts Championship in London; opinions are divided over whether Dutchman, who has dominated sport during era of rapid growth, is better than Phil Taylor of Great Britain, 6-time world champion considered greatest ever.
snippet: Michael van Gerwen has won 25 tournaments this year and about $1.5 million in prize money. But greatness in darts is measured in world championships, and he has only one....
